title: Strategies to Reduce Dropout Rates by Enhancing Online Learning Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic LMS (Learning Management System) operational experience
context.additional_context: Short-term program for job seekers aiming to strengthen social domain job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain three motivation design strategies (SI, PU, SE)
Learners can apply two or more elements that enhance PU (perceived usefulness) to educational content
Learners can practice designing feedback systems to improve SE (self-efficacy)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
